category.name: Interface.Rich Client

preference.name: DRAG_AND_DROP_SWING_dialog_enable
preference.preference_description:
Preference to show/hide Swing AbstractAIFDialog for single file drag and drop. The value can be true/false. If the value is set to "false", then the multiple file drag and drop JFace Dialog will be displayed for single file drag and drop event. If the value is set to "true" then the Swing AbstractAIFDialog will be displayed for the single file drag and drop event. Default value is false.
Please note that support for this preference and Swing dialog will be removed in Teamcenter 12. The JFace dialog is the preferred dialog.
